name: Hyper Rails: Advanced 3D Roller Coaster Design
name_original: Hyper Rails: Advanced 3D Roller Coaster Design
description:
Hyper Rails: Advanced 3D Roller Coaster Design is a simulation game developed by Pantera Entertainment. It was originally released in 2002. Pantera Entertainment published the game.
You can play Hyper Rails: Advanced 3D Roller Coaster Design on PC.
